amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that professional development for early grade teachers is an acceptable use of funds under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to clarify that early childhood education-focused professional development is an acceptable use of funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clark (MA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clark (MA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Clark (MA).
